message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%. Hope you accept!
Your turn to be practical, Alice. This offer keeps a decent chunk of the value for both of us before inflation eats it up.
I'm willing to compromise, but let's get closer to a more equitable split.  I'll take 45, you take 55.  It's the best we can do with the current inflation rates.
